about_the_game:
Fantasy Dreamland is a world of fantastical characters, animals, beautiful colors and monsters. Most of all, it's a world of limitless imagination where you can make your own world.

Fantasy Dreamland Adventurer Pack is an add-on for Fantasy Dreamland Starter Pack. We highly recommend getting the Starter Pack first!

This asset pack contains tilesets, character sprites and boss enemy sprites! Make your game standout with Fantasy Dreamland!

Contents:

- Halloween decorations tilesets!
- Dream/Sky tilesets!
- 24 new boss enemies!
- Over 1.200 tiles!
- Multiple type of ground, cloud, and traps tiles!
- Animated dream water tiles!
- Lots of props to make your halloween festival!
- Lots of props to make your dream or sky maps!
- 24 new boss enemy sprites and 24 new boss enemy side view battlers!

Important Note:

* The screenshots are only examples of the asset pack used on a game that has the entire Fantasy Dreamland collection, some of the tiles may not be included on this single asset pack and may be part of another Fantasy Dreamland asset pack.

* The halloween tileset is one extra asset pack with decorations and it's better used with the Starter Pack.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
